newsitem.title: USA: A.D. Tech offers employees shrs in 401(k).
newsitem.headline: A.D. Tech offers employees shrs in 401(k).

text.p: A.D. Tech said on Friday that it is now offering all of its employees a 401(k) plan that will include the company's shares.
A.D. Tech said it will offer certain levels of contribution matchin provided that the employees' savings are invested in the company's common stock, based upon profitability.
Currently 90 percent of all staff members either own stock or participate in a qualified incentive stock option plan, A.D. Tech said.

Chief financial officer Mark Thomas and Stephen Maughan, vice president of operations, are filing forms with the Securities and Exchange Commission to confirm their purchases of A.D. Tech, the company said. Each executive is buying 10,000 shares, the company said.
